xml.name: Selection
xml.Try: Place the caret before any word. Press EditorNextWordWithSelection to move the caret to the next word and select everything in between.
Press EditorSelectWord to extend the selection to the next code block.
Try increasing your selection with EditorSelectWord until your whole file is selected.
EditorUnSelectWord shrinks the current selection. Try pressing it.
Now select the whole file instantly with $SelectAll.
